column4: i've been having random crashes on 8.04 where it goes to a black screen and puts me back at the login screen, is there any error log that I can pull up to see what's going on?
are you able to log in?  What graphics card do you have?
i log in just fine, and it works pretty well for the most part, just random crashes, im on an nvidia 8800gtx
hmm, not sure, I had ATI graphics problems and it wouldn't even let me log in. Possible related to graphics??? not sure.
is there anything in the logs?
hmm. ., ok i did the cat /var/log/X0rg.0.log and its pretty long.. i didnt see anything
can someone chat with me in pm about this?
a little easier way is, System -> Administration -> System Logs
you can search there, and look for the date of your last crash and last time it happened, and look about that time, that will at least help get you pointed in the right direction
I'm semi Linux knowledgeable, but irc, I'm  a nooooooob.
for sure, i dont know what im looking for in here, my last crash was like 15 minutes ago, so its in here somewhere..
check out your sys, xorg, or kernel,  see if there is anything odd?  Or even keep checking back to see if something always shows up in the logs at the time of crashes.
it will probably say error, or something.
shane: aight, thanks for the help, im looking around
